title: Batman
description: The Dark Knight of Gotham City begins his war on crime with his first major enemy being Jack Napier, a criminal who becomes the clownishly homicidal Joker.

title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
description: In 1938, after his father Professor Henry Jones, Sr. goes missing while pursuing the Holy Grail, Indiana Jones finds himself up against Adolf Hitler's Nazis again to stop them from obtaining its powers.

title: Dead Poets Society
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners IV
description: Maverick teacher John Keating uses poetry to embolden his boarding school students to new heights of self-expression.

title: Driving Miss Daisy
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: An old Jewish woman and her African-American chauffeur in the American South have a relationship that grows and improves over the years.

title: When Harry Met Sally...
description: Harry and Sally have known each other for years, and are very good friends, but they fear sex would ruin the friendship.

title: Do the Right Thing
description: On the hottest day of the year on a street in the Bedford-Stuyvesant section of Brooklyn, everyone's hate and bigotry smolders and builds until it explodes into violence.

title: The Little Mermaid
production_studio: Walt Disney Pictures, Silver Screen Partners IV
description: A mermaid princess makes a Faustian bargain with an unscrupulous sea-witch in order to meet a human prince on land.

title: Field of Dreams
description: An Iowa corn farmer, hearing voices, interprets them as a command to build a baseball diamond in his fields; he does, and the 1919 Chicago White Sox come back to play.

title: Born on the Fourth of July
description: The biography of Ron Kovic. Paralyzed in the Vietnam war, he becomes an anti-war and pro-human rights political activist after feeling betrayed by the country he fought for.

title: Glory
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: Robert Gould Shaw leads the U.S. Civil War's first all-black volunteer company, fighting prejudices from both his own Union army and the Confederates.

title: My Left Foot
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: The true story of Christy Brown, a man with cerebral palsy who learned to write and paint with his left foot.

title: sex, lies, and videotape
description: A man who videotapes his conversations with women about their sexual desires has a profound effect on the lives of a troubled married couple.

title: Back to the Future Part II
description: After visiting 2015, Marty McFly must repeat his visit to 1955 to prevent disastrous changes to 1985... without interfering with his first trip.

title: Lethal Weapon 2
description: Riggs and Murtaugh are on the trail of South African diplomats who are using their immunity to engage in criminal activities.

title: Ghostbusters II
description: The discovery of a massive river of ectoplasm and a resurgence of spectral activity allows the staff of Ghostbusters to revive the business.

title: The Abyss
description: A civilian diving team is enlisted to search for a lost nuclear submarine and faces danger while encountering an alien aquatic species.

title: Honey, I Shrunk the Kids
production_studio: Walt Disney Pictures, Silver Screen Partners III
description: The scientist father of a teenage girl and boy accidentally shrinks his and two other neighborhood teens to the size of insects. Now the teens must fight diminutive dangers as the father searches for them.

title: Steel Magnolias
description: A group of women in a small Southern town share their lives, loves, and losses at a local beauty parlor.

title: The War of the Roses
description: A married couple tries everything to get each other to leave the house in a vicious divorce.

title: Parenthood
description: The Buckmans are a midwestern family all dealing with their lives: estranged relatives, raising children, pressure of the job, and learning to be a good parent and spouse.

title: Uncle Buck
description: A slobbish bachelor becomes the unlikely caretaker of his brother's rebellious teenage daughter and her younger brother and sister.

title: National Lampoon's Christmas Vacation
description: The Griswold family's plans for a big family Christmas predictably turn into a big disaster.

title: Look Who's Talking
description: A single mother finds love with a cab driver, and her baby son has a running commentary on the situation.

title: Pet Sematary
description: A family that moves to a new home in the country discovers a mysterious pet cemetery in the woods behind their house.

title: Crimes and Misdemeanors
description: An ophthalmologist's mistress threatens to reveal their affair to his wife, while a married documentary filmmaker is infatuated with another woman.

title: Say Anything...
description: A noble underachiever and a beautiful valedictorian fall in love the summer before she goes off to college.

title: Henry V
description: In the midst of the Hundred Years' War, the young King Henry V of England embarks on the conquest of France in 1415.

title: The Cook, the Thief, His Wife & Her Lover
description: The wife of a brutish crime boss has an affair with a regular at her husband's restaurant.

title: Road House
description: A tough bouncer is hired to tame a dirty bar.

title: Bill & Ted's Excellent Adventure
production_studio: De Laurentiis Entertainment Group (DEG), Nelson Entertainment
description: Two seemingly dumb teens set off on a quest to prepare the ultimate historical presentation with the help of a time machine.

title: Kiki's Delivery Service
description: A young witch, on her mandatory year of independent life, finds fitting into a new community difficult while she supports herself by running an air courier service.

title: The Killer
production_studio: Film Workshop, Golden Princess Film Production
description: A disillusioned assassin accepts one last hit in hopes of using his earnings to restore vision to a singer he accidentally blinded.

title: Drugstore Cowboy
description: A group of drug addicts in the 1970s Pacific Northwest rob pharmacies to support their habit.

title: Licence to Kill
description: James Bond goes rogue and sets off to unleash vengeance on a drug lord who tortured his best friend, Felix Leiter, and left him for dead.

title: Black Rain
description: Two New York City cops are sent to Japan to extradite a Yakuza gangster, but he escapes and they find themselves in the middle of a gang war.

title: Lean on Me
description: The true story of a tyrannical high school principal who is hired to clean up a failing inner-city school.

title: Casualties of War
description: During the Vietnam War, a soldier finds himself in a moral crisis when his squad kidnaps, rapes, and murders a young Vietnamese woman.

title: The Fabulous Baker Boys
description: Two brothers who are struggling lounge pianists find their act rejuvenated when they hire a beautiful and talented singer.

title: Tango & Cash
description: Two rival LAPD narcotics detectives are framed for a murder and must work together to clear their names.

title: Sea of Love
description: A New York City detective investigates a series of murders of men who have all placed ads in a lonely hearts column.

title: Roger & Me
description: A documentary about the efforts of filmmaker Michael Moore to meet with the CEO of General Motors, Roger Smith, and confront him about the company's plant closures in Flint, Michigan.

title: Weekend at Bernie's
description: Two young insurance corporation employees try to pretend that their murdered employer is still alive, leading the hitman to attempt to track him down to finish him off.

title: Turner & Hooch
production_studio: Touchstone Pictures, Silver Screen Partners IV
description: A detective must adopt the dog of a dead man to help him find the murderer.

title: The 'Burbs
description: An overstressed suburbanite and his neighbors are convinced that the new family on the block is a murderous cult.

title: Major League
description: The new owner of the Cleveland Indians puts together a team of misfits in the hopes of moving the team to Miami.
